publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-947 Ian McKee: Appointment of Lord McCluskey—That the Parliament welcomes Lord McCluskey’s appointment to the role of checking the legality of donations to the Labour Party and wishes him well in this arduous task. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick*

S3M-947 Ian McKee: Appointment of Lord McCluskey—That the Parliament welcomes Lord McCluskey’s appointment to the role of checking the legality of donations to the Labour Party and wishes him well in this arduous task. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-947 Appointment of Lord McCluskey (lodged on 28 November 2007) Michael Matheson*
